Greetings! I have been using TPB and thought I must start giving back to the community. When I want to Virus test a large file or an ISO I use RAR to make archives of 29MB.
Then I go to https://www.virustotal.com/ and upload each archive to be tested.
I use RAR to make small archives because https://www.virustotal.com has a 32mb Limit per upload. Very time consuming BUT YOUR 99 Percent sure your Virus FREE. Never Sure100 Percent!
